title: Lithium Ion Batteries
description: Examob batteries are of the Li-ion type, known for their high energy density, longer lifespan, and lighter weight compared to other battery types.

title: Material
description: Examob batteries are commonly made with plastic components that provide durability and insulation to the electrical components inside. Being lightweight and cost-effective, plastic is a popular choice for battery manufacturing.

title: Capacity
description: The capacity of Examob Laptop Batteries up to 4400mAh and a lifespan of up to 6 years, providing long-lasting and reliable power for your device.
